[Frightening Appearance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2092) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Vigilante" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=326" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 197 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Vigilante](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=80)

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7); [Startling Appearance (Vigilante)](/Feats.aspx?ID=2088)

</column>

---

Your dramatic appearances can frighten bystanders. When you make a [Startling Appearance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2088), you can also attempt to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) each opponent within 10 feet to whom you were [unnoticed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=41) before your Strike.
